title: Draft Pick Matchmaking in EUNE
body:
I'm not sure if this is a problem in NA or EUW but I wanted to share it with you.
So for the past 2 draft pick games (not gonna include a blind pick game where the same exact thing happend too) what ended up happening is the following: [Lobby](https://s4.postimg.org/44dp455nh/lobby.jpg) ,[Everyone's Ranks](https://s13.postimg.org/n7qihcqsn/Ranks.jpg).
And here are how many wins everyone has:
Me - **227**
Darius - **500**
Udyr - **438**
Nunu - **69** ( Is Lvl_** 29**_ )
Ashe - **318**

Kalista - _**508**_
Thresh - _**1456**_
Lee Sin - _**842**_
Viktor - _**1178**_
Fiora - _**1044**_

Don't say the "_**You must have high mmr!**_" Bull cr*p, because how the hell did that nunu get in my game!? In another game (dont have screenshots) my team had a lvl 27, all were bronze/unranked exept my friend and this other dude while the enemy team was all golds and one plat 3, we got crushed! WHAT IS THIS MATCHMAKING!? Just bizarre!

replies.body:
Number of wins cannot always be a trustworthy source of how skilled a player is. Also, someone's ranked rating won't always directly affect their normal match placing. Matchmaking Rating (MMR) really is one of the biggest factors in how players are matched up with and against each other. Our [Matchmaking Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide) goes into complete details on everything involved in this system.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I don't understand why i go against high plats/diamonds when i am only in S1!!! I'm sorry but me getting crushed against diamond players in a normal game where i just wanna chill out and try new things is not fun at all!!! I really am not enjoying playing LoL right now because of the crappy matchmaking i have been getting recently.(THE SYSTEM IS GARBAGE. FIX IT.)
{{champion:142}} - This champ seriously has to be nerfed. I'm not sure if Riot has seen any recent pro play games, but 1 q which has AoE one shots, I'm sorry but that's crappy of riot to think a champ with good mobility, can use ANY summoner spell and item in the game is 'not broken'.

Well i have a question about MMR.I have 2 accounts the one im posting right now and my old one.On the old one when i got to lvl 30 i started playing ranked and in my surprise i got paired with plat 5+ sometimes golds in my placement matches.Can you tell me how did that happened? Because i know that u get mmr from playing ranked games but those were my placement matches..
Your MMR when you first jump into ranked is affected by your Unranked (Normals Draft) MMR
